Baldwin_Park.Workman High School:
William Workman High School is a public high school located in City of Industry, California. It is one of four high schools in the Hacienda La Puente Unified School District.


== Students ==
Students from Valinda School Of Academics, Sierra Vista Middle School, Grandview Middle School, Fairgrove Middle School, and other schools in the district enroll at Workman High School.
